title: If we already live in a NonMuslim country, can we go to another nonMuslim country
transcript: Ahmed from the us if we reside in a non-muslim country is it permissible to travel to other non-muslim countries specifically for the purpose of looking at different natural reserves or different parts of nature that just so happen to be located there as long as you live in a non-muslim country and you go to another non-muslim country where there is no FNA there is no Haram there's no exposure to sins on you more than what is in your normal uh uh place of residence there's no problem in that inshallah
